mapper.sql: IDS, VENDORIDS, TITLE, MOUTH_TRADE, SUBTITLE, COMMON, PRICE, DIS_PRICE, GOODS_CLASS_IDS, STANDARD, CODE, CONTENT, STORE_NUM, REVIEW_DESC, REVIEW_STATUES, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, COLL_NUM, STATUS, START_TIME, END_TIME, ONLINE_TIME, LEAVE_TIME, BRAND_IDS, WEIGHT, DELIVE_WAY, IS_DIS_VERDORNAME, IS_DIS_STANDARD, IS_DIS_STORE, LIMIT_ORDER_NUM, REVIEW_BY, REVIEW_TIME, TOTAL_TRADE, LIMIT_USER_NUM, ORG_PRICE, TYPE, ISSHOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from chn_goodsinfo
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT g.`IDS`,g.`VENDORIDS`,g.`TITLE`,g.`COMMON`,g.`PRICE`,g.`DIS_PRICE`,g.`GOODS_CLASS_IDS` , g.`STANDARD` ,g.`CONTENT`, g.`STORE_NUM`, g.`REVIEW_DESC`, g.`REVIEW_STATUES`, g.`REVIEW_TIME`, g.`UPDATE_BY`, g.`UPDATE_TIME`,g.`CREATE_BY`, g.`CREATE_TIME`,g.`COLL_NUM` ,g.`STATUS`, g.`IS_DIS_STORE`, g.`START_TIME`, g.`END_TIME`, g.`ONLINE_TIME`, g.`LEAVE_TIME`, g.`BRAND_IDS`, g.`WEIGHT`, g.`DELIVE_WAY`, g.`IS_DIS_VERDORNAME`, g.`IS_DIS_STANDARD`, g.`LIMIT_ORDER_NUM`,g.`REVIEW_BY`, g.`REVIEW_TIME`, g.`TOTAL_TRADE`, g.`LIMIT_USER_NUM`, g.`ORG_PRICE`,g.`TYPE`, g.`ISSHOW`, m.`VENDOR_SNM`, m.`PHONE`, m.`VENDER_INTRO`, m.`VENDER_EXPLAIN`, f.`FILEPATH` FROM chn_goodsinfo g ,sp_merchant_user m, goods_file f WHERE g.`IDS`=f.`GOODSIDS` AND g.`VENDORIDS`=m.`VENDOR_ID` AND g.ids = #{ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into chn_goodsinfo (IDS, VENDORIDS, TITLE, MOUTH_TRADE, SUBTITLE, COMMON, PRICE, DIS_PRICE, GOODS_CLASS_IDS, STANDARD, CODE, CONTENT, STORE_NUM, REVIEW_DESC, REVIEW_STATUES, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, COLL_NUM, STATUS, START_TIME, END_TIME, ONLINE_TIME, LEAVE_TIME, BRAND_IDS, WEIGHT, DELIVE_WAY, IS_DIS_VERDORNAME, IS_DIS_STANDARD, IS_DIS_STORE, LIMIT_ORDER_NUM, REVIEW_BY, REVIEW_TIME, TOTAL_TRADE, LIMIT_USER_NUM, ORG_PRICE, TYPE, ISSHOW ) values (#{ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mouthTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsClassIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reviewDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewStatues,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDisVerdorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDisStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDisStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitOrderNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reviewBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limitUserNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isshow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update chn_goodsinfo
IDS = #{record.ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENDORIDS = #{record.vendorids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOUTH_TRADE = #{record.mouthTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUBTITLE = #{record.subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMON = #{record.common,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIS_PRICE = #{record.disPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS_CLASS_IDS = #{record.goodsClassIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STORE_NUM = #{record.storeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CREATE_BY = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLL_NUM = #{record.collNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_TIME = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BRAND_IDS = #{record.brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REVIEW_BY = #{record.reviewBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEW_TIME = #{record.reviewTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_TRADE = #{record.totalTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ORG_PRICE = #{record.orgPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSHOW = #{record.isshow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

VENDORIDS = #{vendorids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update chn_goodsinfo set VENDORIDS = #{vendorids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOUTH_TRADE = #{mouthTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBTITLE = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON = #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIS_PRICE = #{disPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_CLASS_IDS = #{goodsClassIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_NUM = #{storeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REVIEW_DESC = #{reviewDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_STATUES = #{reviewStatues,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLL_NUM = #{collNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE_TIME = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_IDS = #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVE_WAY = #{deliveWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DIS_VERDORNAME = #{isDisVerdorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DIS_STANDARD = #{isDisStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DIS_STORE = #{isDisStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMIT_ORDER_NUM = #{limitOrderNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REVIEW_BY = #{reviewBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_TIME = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_TRADE = #{totalTrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LIMIT_USER_NUM = #{limitUserNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_PRICE = #{orgPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSHOW = #{isshow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IDS = #{ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT g.`IDS`,g.`VENDORIDS`,g.`TITLE`,g.`PRICE`,g.`GOODS_CLASS_IDS`,g.`DIS_PRICE`,g.`COMMON`,g.`STANDARD`,g.`CONTENT`,g.`STORE_NUM`,g.`REVIEW_DESC`,g.`REVIEW_STATUES`,g.`STATUS`,g.`START_TIME`,g.`END_TIME`,f.`FILEPATH` FROM chn_goodsinfo g,goods_file f WHERE 1=1 AND g.`IDS`=f.`GOODSIDS`AND g.`STATUS`="1" AND g.`REVIEW_STATUES`="1" AND g.`GOODS_CLASS_IDS` = #{goodsClassIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
